subject: Athletics and Sports
Cable Television
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball announced an anticipated deal that would keep the Extra Innings package of out-of-market games from being the exclusive property of DirecTV, but with a notable and suspicious wrinkle.
snippet: Major League Baseball announced an anticipated deal that would keep the Extra Innings package of out-of-market games from being the exclusive property of DirecTV, but with a notable and suspicious wrinkle.
